articles.title: RBA Staff ‘Feeling the Weight’ of AI, Tech Shift, Governor Says
articles.summary: Reserve Bank of Australia staff are “feeling the weight” of its technological transformation agenda, Governor Michele Bullock said, adding that the use of big data and artificial intelligence has the potential to transform policy making.
articles.translated_title: RBA Staff ‘Feeling the Weight’ of AI, Tech Shift, Governor Says
articles.translated_summary: Reserve Bank of Australia staff are “feeling the weight” of its technological transformation agenda, Governor Michele Bullock said, adding that the use of big data and artificial intelligence has the potential to transform policy making.

articles.title: Marc Benioff Isn't Sold On AGI Hype, Says He's 'Extremely Suspect' Despite AI Shaping Salesforce Ahead Of Q2 Earnings
articles.summary: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff dismissed hype around artificial general intelligence as "hypnosis," saying today's AI is powerful but not conscious, even as the company cuts jobs, boosts productivity with AI agents, and prepares to report second-quarter earnings.
articles.translated_title: Marc Benioff Isn't Sold On AGI Hype, Says He's 'Extremely Suspect' Despite AI Shaping Salesforce Ahead Of Q2 Earnings
articles.translated_summary: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff dismissed hype around artificial general intelligence as "hypnosis," saying today's AI is powerful but not conscious, even as the company cuts jobs, boosts productivity with AI agents, and prepares to report second-quarter earnings.

articles.title: OpenAI Scoops Up Statsig In $1.1 Billion Deal, CEO Vijaye Raji Joins Applications Unit
articles.summary: OpenAI announced on Tuesday that it acquired Statsig, a product experimentation platform, as the artificial intelligence company continues its aggressive acquisition strategy. Statsig CEO Vijaye Raji will join OpenAI as Chief Technology Officer of Applications, reporting to former Instacart CEO Fidji Simo.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI Scoops Up Statsig In $1.1 Billion Deal, CEO Vijaye Raji Joins Applications Unit

articles.title: Salesforce CEO confirms 4,000 layoffs ‘because I need less heads’ with AI
articles.summary: Salesforce has cut 4,000 of its customer support roles, CEO Marc Benioff recently said while discussing how artificial intelligence has helped reduce the company headcount

articles.title: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff says tech giant cut 4,000 support roles because of AI
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence already is replacing certain jobs at technology companies.

articles.title: Trump says White House window video is AI. His team indicated it's real
articles.summary: President Donald Trump said a video circulating online that showed items being tossed out of an upstairs window of the White House was created with artificial intelligence, despite his press team seeming to confirm the veracity of it hours earlier.
articles.translated_title: Trump says White House window video is AI. His team indicated it's real
articles.translated_summary: President Donald Trump said a video circulating online that showed items being tossed out of an upstairs window of the White House was created with artificial intelligence, despite his press team seeming to confirm the veracity of it hours earlier.

articles.title: Trump Says Video Showing Items Thrown From White House Is AI After His Team Indicates It's Real
articles.summary: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Donald Trump said Tuesday that a video circulating online that showed items being tossed out of an upstairs window of the White House was created with artificial intelligence, despite his press team seeming to confirm the veracity of it hours earlier.
articles.translated_title: Trump Says Video Showing Items Thrown From White House Is AI After His Team Indicates It's Real

articles.title: Anthropic completes new funding round at $183 billion value
articles.summary: Anthropic has closed a deal to raise $13 billion from investors in a new funding round that nearly triples its valuation to $183 billion, including dollars raised a larger-than-expected haul that makes the artificial intelligence company one of the most valuable startups in the world.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic completes new funding round at $183 billion value
